body:
i'm thankful for the BLTs i made for dinner yesterday. i'm thankful that though i don't love mayo in many contexts, i love it in the context of BLTs. i'm thankful when i'm toasting bread and i get it to just the right amount of toastiness. i'm thankful to remember the tomato sandwiches my mom made me when i was a kid. i'm thankful for how much d loves corn on the cob. i'm thankful for fresh green beans, which are so much better than the canned ones we had growing up (i'm thankful to love crunchy things more than mushy things). i'm thankful for jelly donuts. i'm thankful for gatorade after a long sweaty run. i'm thankful for potato chips. i'm thankful i have a bit of a tan. 

i'm thankful that miso is getting more comfortable outside and better at going to the bathroom on command. i'm thankful, now that i must say "go potty" a lot more than i have for a long time, to always be reminded of how carly rae jepsen pronounces "party" to rhyme with "body" when she sings "i'm sick of the party, party" in "[run away with me](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TeccAtqd5K8)," which has always sounded like "i'm sick of the potty, potty" to me. i'm thankful that d has a tea tree oil roll-on that we have been rolling on to our mosquito bites. i'm thankful that eventually all the mosquitoes will die.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful for the BLTs i made for dinner yesterday. i'm thankful that though i don't love mayo in many contexts, i love it in the context of BLTs. i'm thankful when i'm toasting bread and i get it to just the right amount of toastiness. i'm thankful to remember the tomato sandwiches my mom made me when i was a kid. i'm thankful for how much d loves corn on the cob. i'm thankful for fresh green beans, which are so much better than the canned ones we had growing up (i'm thankful to love crunchy things more than mushy things). i'm thankful for jelly donuts. i'm thankful for gatorade after a long sweaty run. i'm thankful for potato chips. i'm thankful i have a bit of a tan. 

i'm thankful that miso is getting more comfortable outside and better at going to the bathroom on command. i'm thankful, now that i must say "go potty" a lot more than i have for a long time, to always be reminded of how carly rae jepsen pronounces "party" to rhyme with "body" when she sings "i'm sick of the party, party" in "[run away with me](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TeccAtqd5K8)," which has always sounded like "i'm sick of the potty, potty" to me. i'm thankful that d has a tea tree oil roll-on that we have been rolling on to our mosquito bites. i'm thankful that eventually all the mosquitoes will die.
